islands.title: Discover Mentawai Islands
islands.subtitle: Four pristine islands, each with unique character and endless opportunities. From world-class surf breaks to untouched rainforests, find your perfect island paradise.
islands.whyInvestDesc: The Mentawai Islands offer a rare combination of natural beauty, investment potential, and authentic island living.

descriptions.siberut: The largest island in the Mentawai archipelago with strong traditional culture and world-class surf spots like Macaronis and Lance's Left.
descriptions.sipora: An island with beautiful beaches and perfect waves for surfing. Famous for surf spots like Telescopes and Iceland.
descriptions.pagai-utara: A peaceful island with pristine natural beauty. Perfect for tourism property investment and resorts.
descriptions.pagai-selatan: The southernmost island with exotic beaches and great potential for tourism property development.

about.title: About Mentawai Shores
about.subtitle: Your trusted gateway to paradise properties in the beautiful Mentawai Islands. We connect dreamers with their perfect slice of tropical heaven.
about.ourStoryPara1: Founded by locals who grew up surfing the legendary waves and exploring the pristine beaches of Mentawai, we understand the magic of these islands like no one else.
about.ourStoryPara2: What started as a passion project to share our home with the world has grown into the most trusted property platform in the Mentawai archipelago. We've helped hundreds of families, investors, and dreamers find their perfect property in paradise.
about.ourStoryPara3: Our mission is simple: to make island living accessible while preserving the natural beauty and cultural heritage that makes Mentawai so special.
